mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ta_point_data (point_id, create_time, date_show, hour_show, point_data) VALUES (#{pointId}, #{createTime}, #{dateShow}, #{hourShow}, #{pointData});
mapper.select: select * from ta_point_data where point_id in (${pointIds}) and create_time >= date_format(#{startExpDate},'%Y%m%d') and create_time <= date_format(#{endExpDate},'%Y%m%d') order by create_time asc,point_id asc
